name: NFT Pawn Shop
description:
NFT pawn shop is a crypto protocol project that uses NFTs as collateral for p2p loans. Follow along or contribute by joining the discord: https://discord.gg/6nhKFS59. Use this design file as a base to build off of or riff on the work-in-progress.
